text: Jerrier A. "Jerry" Haddad (July 17, 1922 â€“ March 31, 2017) was an American computer engineer. He was a fellow of both the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers and the American Association for the Advancement of Science, and was a member of the National Academy of Engineering. He was born in New York City. Haddad died on March 31, 2017, aged 94. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Engineers from New York (state) Category:American computer scientists Category:Scientists from New York City
title: Jerrier A. Haddad
